title: JamesBorn
author: JamesBorn
content: Sundays are God faithfulness in the lives of Christians. Those who believe in God worship and adores His holy name on Sundays, we're return all glory to him for keeping us from Monday to Sunday. As our Muslim brothers too blessed Allah for his faithfulness on Fridays. This coming Sunday is Easter Sunday and Easter celebration, share love and make someone who is a stranger to you happy. After easter Ramadan celebration is coming too. Is all season of love, to me we are all one. I love and celebrate our Muslim brothers, I love their unity and their lifestyles of assistant each other in life endeavors. Christians too are known for hospitality and charity, let's shine all bright in the faces of others who need us most.

comments.author: Chinedu kalu
comments.body: Let us all try to show love to each other in this season of Easter. Happy Easter in advance, I love y'all

comments.author: dravenbtc
comments.body: Let's remember about what's most important on our life - family.
